description:
A hike-able onesie that looks as good on the trail as it does when you stop for hard earned refreshments. Made from a wind blocking bluesign approved nylon blend, the Iris II jumpsuit makes blustery days in the great outdoors a lot more enjoyable.

  • Made of nylon and spandex stretch taffeta that's wicking and wind resistant
  • High collar keeps chilly winds from creeping in
  • Toggle adjustment at the back of the neck lets you seal the cozy in
  • Elasticised cuffs help keep the warm right where you want it
  • Adjustable silhouette via the drawstring at the waist
  • Bellows hand pockets keep hands out of the wind and necessities close
  • Rib panels at the inseam adda little stretch where it is needed most
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabrics add confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Indyeva Iris II Jumpsuit - Women's
